items.headline: Getting the most out of autistic employees and helping everyone to thrive.

items.title: BCBA - Board Certified Behavior Analyst practice exams
items.headline: Pass the BCBA certification on the first attempt. 95 questions
objectives_summary: The Board Certified Behavior Analyst® (BCBA®) is a graduate-level certification in behavior analysis. Professionals who are certified at the BCBA level are independent practitioners who provide behavior-analytic services. In addition, BCBAs supervise the work of Board Certified Assistant Behavior Analysts, Registered Behavior Technicians, and others who implement behavior-analytic interventions.

items.title: Improving Diversity and Inclusion (DEI) in Your Workplace
items.headline: Diversity and Inclusion is more than policies, programs, and headcounts!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be able to describe the definition and importance of diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) and how you are personally responsible for upholding DEI in your workplace.
Understand what diversity and inclusion are and how to measure them.
Explain why DEI matters in the workplace and in ones personal life.

items.title: Business Etiquette for Professionals
items.headline: Learn the manners expected in business today and how they can help you build stronger relationships.
objectives_summary: At the end of my course, students will be able to use etiquette to improve relationships and take advantage of business opportunites.
